name: dataflight-claude-plugins
description: Official Claude Code plugins for DataFlight workflows

plugins.name: graphite
plugins.description: Automate Graphite stacked-PR workflow with commands for creating diffs and submitting PRs

plugins.name: gt
plugins.description: Short aliases for Graphite workflow commands (/gt:create, /gt:submit, /gt:create-submit)

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation with Playwright. Auto-invoked skill for custom automation plus quick commands for screenshots, link checking, and responsive testing.
